msgs.AuthFormatMessages_Login01: Login length must be at least 8 characters long.
msgs.AuthFormatMessages_Password01: Password must contain at least one capital letter.
msgs.AuthFormatMessages_Password02: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
msgs.AuthFormatMessages_Password03: Password must contain at least one digit.
msgs.AuthFormatMessages_Password04: Password length must be at least 8 characters long.
msgs.AuthChallengeMessages_NewPhone: Enter you new mobile phone number
msgs.AuthAlert_AuthProcessAlreadyStarted: Another Authentication Process is already started.
msgs.AuthAlert_IncorrectAuthProcess: Invalid call for currently active Authentication Process.
msgs.AuthAlert_SignUpMissingLogin: Attempt to Sign Up with no Login value.
msgs.AuthAlert_SignUpMissingPassword: Attempt to Sign UP with no Password value.
msgs.AuthAlert_SignUpMissingEmail: Attempt to Sign Up with no Email value.
msgs.AuthAlert_SignUpMissingCode: Attempt to Sign Up with no Code value.
msgs.AuthAlert_InvalidCallToResendAsyncCode: Invalid request to resend authentication code.
msgs.AuthAlert_AccountWithThatEmailAlreadyExi: Another account with that email already exists.
msgs.AuthAlert_EmailAddressIsTheSame: New email address is the same as currently registered email address.
msgs.AuthAlert_VerifyCalledButNoChallengeFoun: A verify challenge was called but no current challenge was found.
msgs.AuthAlert_NeedToBeSignedIn: You need to be signed in to perform the requested operation.
msgs.AuthAlert_InvalidOperationWhenSignedIn: You need to be signed out to perform the requested operation.
msgs.AuthAlert_NotConfirmed: User credentials can not be confirmed.
msgs.AuthAlert_LoginAlreadyUsed: Sorry, that user login is already used. Please choose another.
msgs.AuthAlert_EmailFormatRequirementsFailed: The supplied Email is not valid.
msgs.AuthAlert_PhoneFormatRequirementsFailed: The supplied Phone is not valid.
msgs.AuthAlert_TooManyAttempts: You have exceeded the login attempt limit. Try again later.
msgs.AuthAlert_OperationNotSupportedByAuthPro: Operation not supported by current auth provider.
msgs.AuthAlert_LimitExceededException: Too many attempts. Try again later.
